abstract: The government of Iran appeared to coalesce around at least one explanation for the Justice Department's accusations of an assassination plot: Occupy Wall Street.
snippet: The government of Iran appeared to coalesce around at least one explanation for the Justice Department's accusations of an assassination plot: Occupy Wall Street.
lead_paragraph: A day after the Justice Department accused Iranian agents of plotting an elaborate international scheme to assassinate a Saudi Arabian diplomat on American soil, the government of Iran appeared to coalesce around at least one explanation for the news: Occupy Wall Street.

headline.main: Iran Sees Plot Accusation as Diversion From Wall Street Protests
